text: Final results for the boxing competition at the 1952 Summer Olympics. The events were held at Messuhalli. From this edition of the Olympic Games, the bronze medal match was abolished. ==Medal summary== {| |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Flyweight (−51 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Bantamweight (−54 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Featherweight (−57 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Lightweight (−60 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Light welterweight (−63.5 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Welterweight (−67 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Light middleweight (−71 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Middleweight (−75 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Light heavyweight (−81 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-valign="top" |rowspan=2|Heavyweight (+81 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== * Official Olympic Report Category:1952 Summer Olympics events 1952 Category:1952 in boxing
